building_blocks.tldr: Draw a circle on a white canvas with black border
building_blocks.prompt: Generate a Python Turtle program that draws a circle with a black border on a white background. The circle should have a radius of 100 pixels and no fill color.

building_blocks.tldr: Draw a square on a white canvas with black border
building_blocks.prompt: Generate a Python Turtle program that draws a square with a black border on a white background. The square should have a side length of 100 pixels and no fill color.

building_blocks.tldr: Draw an equilateral triangle on a white canvas with black border
building_blocks.prompt: Generate a Python Turtle program that draws an equilateral triangle with a black border on a white background. The triangle should have a side length of 100 pixels and no fill color.

building_blocks.tldr: Draw a hexagon on a white canvas with black border
building_blocks.prompt: Generate a Python Turtle program that draws a regular hexagon with a black border on a white background. The hexagon should have a side length of 50 pixels and no fill color.
